ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour,   +   1/4 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon,   +   3/4 cup vegetable oil, 3  eggs, 2 cups white sugar, 2 cups peeled shredded pears, 1 cup chopped pecans, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
nutrition: Total Fat 13g 17%, Saturated Fat 2g 9%, Cholesterol 28mg 9%, Sodium 196mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 38g 14%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 1mg 4%, Calcium 19mg 1%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 75mg 2%
